revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=OPURES |model=OP2200V |fcc_date=10/15/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Shenzhen Opures |type=wireless speaker system, audio streamer |fcc_id=2AIFX-OP2200V |pwr_v=15 |pwr_amp=1.4 |pwr_conn=barrel |wi1_module=Linkplay A31 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7688A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |addl_chips=Bluetooth 4.1 SoC;Cambridge Silicon Radio (CSR);CSR8811;;1; |flags=Bluetooth 4.1, Alexa, Audio in (3.5mm), |802dot11_protocols=bgn }} {{TagLine|Alexa Voice Control Wi-Fi Speaker}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.opures.com/product.html?product_category=69}}
"ECHC_MAIN_V1.5" and "20170705" are silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
